Metadata.summary: CAUTION Non-standard The Metadata interface contains information about a file system entry. This metadata includes the file's size and modification date and time.

blockquote.para: This interface isn't available through the global scope; instead, you obtain a Metadata object describing a using the method .

MetadataModificationTime.summary:
CAUTION Non-standard The read-only modificationTime
property of the interface is a {{jsxref("Date")}} object which
specifies the date and time the file system entry (or the data referenced by the
entry) was last modified. A file system entry is considered to have been
modified if the metadata or the contents of the referenced file (or directory, or
whatever other kind of file system entry might exist on the platform in use) has
changed.
MetadataModificationTime.value: A timestamp indicating when the file system entry was last changed.

MetadataSize.summary:
CAUTION Non-standard The read-only size property of
the interface specifies the size, in bytes, of the referenced
file or other file system object on disk.
MetadataSize.value: A number indicating the size of the file in bytes.
